item.title: Satan: Hijacker of a Planet
item.dc:creator: Louise Erdrich
item.description: ON the outskirts of a small town in the West, on an afternoon when rain was promised, we sat upon the deck of our new subdivision ranchette and watched the sky pitch over Hungry Horse.

item.title: Saint Marie

item.description: So when I went there, I knew the dark fish must rise. Plumes of radiance had been soldered on me.

item.title: The Flower
item.dc:creator: Louise Erdrich
item.description: Outside an isolated Ojibwe country trading post in the year 1839, Mink was making an incessant racket.
